P, p noun
(SIGN)
[ U ] UK written abbreviation for
parking , used especially on road signs

p noun [C]
(MONEY)
UK abbreviation for
penny or
pence : Could you lend me 50p? This newspaper costs 90p. I need a 1p/5p/20p coin/piece.
More examplesFewer examplesHave you got 20p for the phone?You can get 40p off a chocolate bar with this voucher.
